description.value:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You attempt a check to remove or counteract an effect with the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Confused]{Confused}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Controlled]{Controlled}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fascinated]{Fascinated}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Immobilized]{Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Paralyzed]{Paralyzed}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Restrained]{Restrained} conditions

Effect You roll twice and use the better result.
